thread.title: Kanye West looks glum at dinner without Kim Kardashian
thread.title_full: Kanye West looks glum at dinner without Kim Kardashian | Daily Mail Online

author: Jessica Rach
title: Kanye West looks glum at dinner without Kim Kardashian
text:
He opted out of the Kardashian family holiday to Costa Rica.
And Kanye West appeared in glum spirits as he left dinner with pals in LA on Monday night.
The hitmaker, 39, was perhaps missing wife Kim Kardashian who spent the weekend in Costa Rica with the clan.
Scroll down for video
Missing Kim? Kanye West appeared in glum spirits as he left dinner with pals in LA on Monday night
Sporting red Adidas tracksuit bottoms and a loose grey sweater, Kanye cut a casual figure as he headed to the car with his pals.
Wearing his hair in a bleached crop cut, he opted to ride in the passenger seat of his pal's car.
Meanwhile Kim and children North and Saint were heading home in a private plane, following a family holiday with Kris Jenner, her boyfriend Corey Gamble, Khloe and Kourtney Kardashian and her children, Kylie Jenner and her boyfriend Tyga.
Heading home: The hitmaker, 39, was perhaps missing wife Kim Kardashian who spent the weekend in Costa Rica with the clan
Kim has been documenting her return from their sun-soaked family holiday.
North West was featured in a series of sweet snaps on Monday as the family headed back home after a four-day trip in Costa Rica.
The mother-daughter duo posed for different Snapchat filters, taking delight in the various animal ears and altered voices.
Boys' night: Sporting red Adidas tracksuit bottoms and a loose grey sweater, Kanye cut a casual figure as he headed to the car with his pals
Cute as a porcupine! North West posed in a series of sweet snaps on Monday for mom Kim as they headed home from their sun-soaked holiday
Munching on cookies, the 36-year-old reality star took to her Snapchat as North dazzled in pink animated flowers on top of her head as one of the filters.
Cool beyond her years, the tot wore a red velvet dress and a decorative denim jacket as she struck a pose for the camera.
The pair turned to Snapchat to help pass the time before the plane departed to Los Angeles.
Flower power: The three-year-old enjoyed mastering the selfie game with selfie queen and Kim
Yum: The mother-daughter duo appeared to be passing the time before their plane departed to Los Angeles from Costa Rica
How do I look? The daughter of Kim and Kanye looked cool beyond her years in a red velvet dress and decorative denim jacket
Looking cute in the floral Snapchat filters, North was more amused by the animal filters, including the porcupine, that gave her big eyes and spikes.
Showing off the floppy dog ears and nose, she and Kim mimed out dog noises on the popular app.
While Snapchat distracted Little North, she became briefly impressed with her aunt Khloe's pants as she grabbed at the crystals that spelled Juicy.
Nice shades: She appeared to love the sunglasses Snapchat filter
Woof: North was highly amused at the animal and voice filters
As they prepared to take off, Kim filmed her daughter reached for her bum.
'It's sparkly huh? It's Juicy huh?' Kim asked her cheeky little tot.
The family was in Costa Rica for several days as the filmed season 13 of their reality TV series for E!, Keeping Up With The Kardashians.
Cheeky tot: However not as amused as she was with her aunt's pants, grabbing at the crystals that spelled out Juicy
The much-photographed holiday appeared to cement Kim's return to the spotlight for 2017.
The clan kept their fans updated with numerous self-indulgent selfies, showcasing their much-seen bodies in racy bathing suits and tank tops.
While Kourtney's estranged boyfriend- father of her three children was also there, Kendall and Caitlyn Jenner appeared to opt out of the trip.
Couldn't help it: As they prepared to take off, Kim filmed her daughter on Snapchat as she grabbed at Khloe's rear end
